name: Yves Caniou
content: Yves Caniou | Yves Caniou Yves Caniou UCBL ÃNS UFR Informatique 43 bd du 11 novembre 1918 69622 Villeurbanne tÃ©l: +33 4 26 23 44 65 fax: +33 4 72 43 15 36 (mention "for Y. Caniou") ÃNS-Lyon, LIP 46 AllÃ©e d'Italie 69364 LYON Cedex 07 fax: +33 4 72 72 80 80 Contact Me | Teaching | Research | Fun | Interesting Links | Zic Homepage | Newz | Old Page - Since 2016 Responsable of the Linux Professionnal Institute examination at the Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1. -- LPI000404422 ID: LPIC-1 on 2018/06/22. - Since 2015 Responsable of the M2 SRIV alternance formation of the Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1. - Since 2014 Co-responsable then responsable of the M2 SIR alternance formation of the Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1. - Between 2012 and 2014 Délégation CNRS: I worked in the Japanese French Laboratory of Informatics (JFLI) in Tokyo, at Tokyo University. - Between 2009 and 2011 Délégation CNRS: I worked in the Japanese French Laboratory of Informatics (JFLI) in Tokyo, at the National Institute of Informatics (NII) and Tokyo University. - Since 2005 Associate Professor at the Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1, associated to the GRAAL lab of the LIP department in Lyon. - Between 2004 and 2005 ATER at École normale supérieure de Lyon in the GRAAL lab of the LIP department in Lyon. - Between 2001 and 2004 PhD Student during 3 years in the AlGorille lab at the Université Henri Poincaré in Nancy. Subject: Scheduling on a Metacomputing Platform. Directors: Emmanuel Jeannot and Jens Gustedt. Fellow of the CIES thus teaching during 3 year. - Between 2000 and 2001 DEA (Research Master) at the Henri Poincaré University in Nancy. Internship with Zineb Habbas in the LITA in Metz. Professor assistant directed by Mickaël Krajecki and Christophe Jaillet at the Faculté des Sciences of Reims.
